sourcesContent:
import tw from "twin.macro";

export const Input = tw.input`
  px-4
  py-2
  placeholder-gray-500
  w-auto
  lg:mx-auto
  focus:ring-primary-100
  focus:border-primary-500
  border-gray-400
  border-width[1px]
  border-solid
  rounded-md
  shadow-xs
`;

export const InputTextLeft = tw(Input)`text-left py-2`;
